00043 Core::Core(ITwitReply *obj)
00044 {
00045     m_subscriber = obj;
00046     m_eventLoop = new QEventLoop(this);
00047         m_http = new QHttp(TWITTER_HOST);
00048 
00049         MakeConnections();
00050 }
00051 //=====================================================================
00052 Core::~Core()
00053 {
00054     if(m_eventLoop)
00055         delete m_eventLoop;
00056     if(m_http)
00057         delete m_http;
00058 }
00059 //=====================================================================
00060 void Core::MakeConnections()   
00061 {
00062     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(dataReadProgress(int, int)), this, SLOT(DataReadProgress(int, int)));   
00063     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(requestStarted(int)), this, SLOT(RequestStarted(int)));
00064     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(requestFinished(int,bool)), this, SLOT(ReqFinished(int, bool)));
00065     connect(m_http, SIGNAL(done(bool)), this, SLOT(Done(bool)));
00066     connect(this, SIGNAL(QueryDone()), m_eventLoop, SLOT(quit()));
00067 }
00068 //=====================================================================
00069 void Core::Done ( bool /*error*/ )
00070 {
00071     emit QueryDone();
00072 }
00073 //=====================================================================
00074 void Core::DataReadProgress ( int /*done*/, int /*total*/ )
00075 {
00076     //m_subscriber->OnMessageReceived(QString::number(done).toStdString()+" / "+QString::number(total).toStdString());
00077 }
00078 //=====================================================================
00079 int Core::MakeGetRequest(QString req)
00080 {
00081     int reqId;
00082     QBuffer *tempBuffer = new QBuffer;
00083     tempBuffer->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite);
00084     reqId = m_http->get(req,tempBuffer);
00085     m_buffer[reqId] = tempBuffer;
00086         return reqId;
00087 }
00088 //=====================================================================
00089 int Core::MakePostRequest(QString path,QByteArray req)
00090 {
00091     int reqId;
00092     QBuffer *tempBuffer = new QBuffer;
00093     tempBuffer->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite);
00094     reqId = m_http->post(path,req,tempBuffer);
00095     m_buffer[reqId] = tempBuffer;
00096         return reqId;
00097 }
00098 //=====================================================================
00099 void Core::RequestStarted(int /*id*/)
00100 {}
00101 //=====================================================================
00102 void Core::ReqFinished(int id, bool error)
00103 {
00104     QByteArray resp;
00105     QHttpResponseHeader head;
00106     
00107     head = m_http->lastResponse();
00108     if(head.isValid())
00109         responseHeaderReceived(head);
00110      
00111     if(m_buffer[id])
00112         resp = m_buffer[id]->data();
00113      
00114     if(error)
00115     {
00116         m_subscriber->OnError(m_http->errorString().toStdString());
00117     }
00118     else if(id == m_loginId)
00119     {      
00120         m_credentialsId = MakeGetRequest(VERIFY_CREDENTIALS_URL);
00121     }
00122     else if(id == m_credentialsId)
00123     {
00124         QString buffer = QString(resp);
00125         if(buffer.contains("true"))
00126             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(true);
00127         else
00128             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(false);
00129     }
00130     else
00131     {
00132         m_subscriber->OnMessageReceived(QString(resp).toStdString());
00133     }
00134     
00135     if(m_buffer[id])
00136     {
00137         m_buffer[id]->close();
00138         delete m_buffer[id];
00139         m_buffer[id] = NULL;
00140     }
00141 }
00142 //=====================================================================
00143 void Core::responseHeaderReceived(const QHttpResponseHeader &resp)
00144 {
00145         switch(resp.statusCode())
00146         {
00147                 case SERVER::OK:
00148             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::OK);
00149                         break;
00150                 case SERVER::NOT_MODIFIED:
00151             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_MODIFIED);
00152                         break;
00153                 case SERVER::BAD_REQUEST:
00154             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::BAD_REQUEST);
00155                         break;
00156                 case SERVER::NOT_AUTHORIZED:
00157             m_subscriber->OnLoginStatus(false);
00158             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_AUTHORIZED);
00159                         break;
00160                 case SERVER::FORBIDDEN:
00161             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::FORBIDDEN);
00162                         break;
00163                 case SERVER::NOT_FOUND:
00164             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::NOT_FOUND);
00165                         break;
00166                 case SERVER::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR:
00167             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);
00168                         break;
00169                 case SERVER::BAD_GATEWAY:
00170             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::BAD_GATEWAY);
00171                         break;
00172                 case SERVER::SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE:
00173             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE);
00174                         break;
00175                 default:
00176             m_subscriber->OnStatusReceived(SERVER::UNKNOWN);
00177                         break;
00178         }
00179 }

00188 {

00191     req.replace("[req-id]",id);

00193     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00194 }

00226 void Core::GetUsersTimeline(SERVER::Option2 *opt  /*=NULL*/)
00227 {
00228     QString buildUrl = USERS_TIMELINE_URL;
00229     
00230     if(opt)
00231     {
00232         QString user        = opt->user.c_str();
00233         QString count      = QString::number(opt->count);
00234         QString since       = opt->since.c_str();
00235         QString sinceId    = QString::number(opt->sinceId);
00236         QString page       = QString::number(opt->page);
00237         
00238         if(!user.isEmpty())
00239             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00240         else
00241             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00242         
00243         buildUrl += "?count="+count;
00244         buildUrl += "&since="+since;
00245         buildUrl += "&since_id="+sinceId;
00246         buildUrl += "&page="+page;
00247     }
00248     else
00249     {
00250         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00251     }
00252 
00253     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);
00254     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00255 }

00258 {
00259     QString buildUrl  = GET_FAVORITES_URL;
00260     
00261     if(!user.isEmpty())
00262         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00263     else
00264         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00265     
00266     buildUrl += "?page="+page;
00267     
00268     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);    
00269     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00270 }

00293 void Core::PostNewStatus(QString status)
00294 {
00295     QByteArray encodedUrl, req;
00296     encodedUrl = QUrl::toPercentEncoding(status);
00297     
00298     req = "status=";
00299     req += encodedUrl;
00300     
00301     MakePostRequest(POST_NEW_STATUS_URL,req);
00302     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);

00334 void Core::GetFriends(SERVER::Option4 *opt  /*=NULL*/)
00335 {
00336     QString buildUrl = GET_FRIENDS_URL;
00337     
00338     if(opt)
00339     {
00340         QString user        = opt->user.c_str();
00341         QString page       = QString::number(opt->page);
00342         QString lite          = opt->lite ? "true" : "false";
00343         QString since       = opt->since.c_str();

00345         if(!user.isEmpty())
00346             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","/"+user);
00347         else
00348             buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");
00349         
00350         buildUrl += "?page="+page;
00351         buildUrl += "&lite="+lite;
00352         buildUrl += "&since="+since;

00356         buildUrl.replace("[/opt-user]","");

00437 //=====================================================================
00438 void Core::SendDirectMessage(QString user, QString text)
00439 {
00440     QByteArray encodedText, req;
00441     encodedText = QUrl::toPercentEncoding(text);
00442     
00443     req = "user=";
00444     req += user.toAscii();
00445     req += "&";
00446     req += "text=";
00447     req += encodedText;
00448     
00449     MakePostRequest(SEND_NEW_DIRECT_MESSAGE_URL,req);
00450     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00451 }

00500 void Core::UpdateLocation(QString location)

00504

00511 //=====================================================================
00512 void Core::UpdateDeliveryDevice(SERVER::DEVICES device)
00513 {
00514     QString buildUrl = UPDATE_DELIVERY_DEVICE;
00515 
00516     switch(device)
00517     {
00518         case SERVER::SMS:
00519             buildUrl += "?device=sms";
00520             break;
00521         case SERVER::IM:
00522             buildUrl += "?device=im";
00523            break;
00524         case SERVER::NONE:
00525             buildUrl += "?device=none";
00526             break;
00527     }
00528     
00529     MakeGetRequest(buildUrl);
00530     m_eventLoop->exec(QEventLoop::AllEvents);
00531 }
